short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Word Cram Tab extension to search directly from a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Word Cram is an extension designed to enhance your English vocabulary skills. With this interactive extension, you can effortlessly expand your knowledge of English words and their meanings. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, this extension is your go-to resource for improving your language proficiency.

Extension can be customised to suit user preferences.

"By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the 'Word Cram' extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
The extension replaces your New Tab search engine and provides a new search experience with search results by Microsoft Bing.

Terms of Use: https://word-cram.com/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://word-cram.com/pages/policy

For more information please visit: https://word-cram.com/
Enjoy and please don't forget to  leave us a 5 start review!
